main.name: Vinay Valson
main.description: I'm a Software Engineer who is afraid of being outdated. If you want me to create amazing pages like this one, You can find me here
main.bio: Demonstrating adaptability is as intrinsic as being technically sound. I am seeking an opportunity where I can productively utilize my technical, communication and presentation skills to bring in productivity and change in the workplace. I am fond of automation of repetitive processes and bringing in changes to existing procedures to become more productive and keeping procedures streamlined.
main.contactmessage: Contact me if you appreciate my work

experience.title: Associate Consultant
experience.description: Working under the DigX Part of Oracle’s Banking Division. Engineered J2EE applications with JPA, Oracle WebLogic Server and Apache CORDOVA. Built microservices using JaRXS. Did Dockerization of applications

experience.title: Software Developer Intern
experience.description: Widget Development. Created Bookmark widget for Ubuntu systems using Gnome toolkit. Same was implemented as a chrome extension and Electron

experience.title: Tech Developer/R&D Technology Intern
experience.description: Bitcoin Wallet Tracking. Made an Android app that enables tracking of ERC -20 contracts. The app alerts the user of bitcoin whales and high value transactions of ERC -20 contracts that take place in the Cryptocurrency market. JSON parsing was done using JAVA on API’s provided by etherscan.io
